abstract: L.A. Reid, one of the judges on "The X Factor," says he "won't trash talk" the decisions of Simon Cowell, a fellow judge, but adds, "I may have made some different choices."
snippet: L.A. Reid, one of the judges on "The X Factor," says he "won't trash talk" the decisions of Simon Cowell, a fellow judge, but adds, "I may have made some different choices."

headline.main: L.A. Reid Defends His 'X Factor' Choices
